## Form.setDataSource() method

Set the datasource for the given block

**Signature:**

```typescript
setDataSource(block: string, source: DataSource): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  block | string | The block for which to set the data source. |
|  source | [DataSource](./forms42core.datasource.md) | The data source to set. |

**Returns:**

void
